objects.text: • PREMIUM DESIGN • VERSATILE 2-PIECE SET • SPACIOUS STORAGE
EARLY BIRD SPECIALS - LIMITED TIME OFFER

product_details.name: Elegant 2-Piece Tote & Crossbody Set - Classic Caramel Collection
product_details.description:
• Premium faux leather construction with durable stitching
• Versatile 2-piece set including spacious tote bag and compact crossbody
• Sophisticated caramel brown color with navy blue accent trim
• Gold-tone hardware and decorative metal accents
• Secure top closure with convenient magnetic snap
• Multiple interior compartments for organized storage
• Comfortable shoulder straps with reinforced stitching
• Perfect for both professional and casual occasions
• Complementary crossbody bag with adjustable strap
• Ideal size for daily essentials - laptop, tablet, and personal items

banner_details:
This banner displays a refined promotional design for a fashion product. Central focus is placed on a handbag set image (`product_image`) framed inside a white circular area with subtle gold decorative rings, creating a spotlight effect. The main headline (`heading`) is positioned at the top in bold navy blue text, followed by a powerful subheading (`subheading`) in a rich bronze-orange color. Supporting this is a tagline (`tagline`) in understated navy text. A price highlight (`price`) sits within a bold navy circular badge on the right. The footer features a product description (`description`) and a clear call-to-action button (`cta` and `cta_background`) in bronze with white text. 

**Color Palette:**
- Background: Beige gradient (#F8EFE4 to #D9B396)
- Text Primary: Navy Blue (#304269)
- Highlight/CTA: Bronze (#B87333)
- Accent: Soft Gold (#D4AF37)
- Price Badge: Solid Navy Blue (#304269)
- White Elements: (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features two elegant handbags in a soft, warm peachy-tan base color (#D59A76). The primary bag showcases clean, smooth surfaces with golden hardware accents (#D4AF37), adding sophistication. The smaller bag carries the same peach shade but is contrasted with deep navy trim and handle (#1C2541), giving bold definition and visual balance. The colors blend harmoniously without overpowering each other, while the metallic gold elements draw attention. This palette is ideal for a chic and minimalistic banner—consider using peach (#D59A76), navy (#1C2541), cream white (#F9F6F0), and gold (#D4AF37) for a refined, stylish aesthetic in advertising.
